alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Kings and Nassau Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Coney Island, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Flatbush, Levittown, Freeport, Valley Stream, Long Beach, Coney Island, Garden City, Massapequa, Lynbrook, Mineola, Woodmere, Westbury, Rockaway Beach and Kennedy Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
